tweet:
Congress leader Feroz Khan from Hyderabad announced bounty of Rs 50 lakh to behead ex-UP Shia Board Chief Wasim Rizvi.

He also offered legal help to the one who will behead Wasim Rizvi.

Now, secularism is not in danger.
